I'm Jocelyn Kamai.

NuCamp Coding Bootcamp Student.

Aloha!

Born and raised in Hawaii, on the island of Oahu. I have always held an interest in coding but found it intimidating until I had a conversation with one of my aunts who motivated me to give it a try. Although I am new to the coding world, my experience working in a call center environment, means having exceptional active listening and communication skills. It also includes attention to detail, knowledge retention and calmness under pressure.
